text: Apologies for the delay in replying! I’ve updated my notifications on the app now! I have a website at <https://www.chloeoconnor.com/> where I have posted some personal work, and a bit of the work I’ve done on my traineeship. My main focus would be on 3D modeling/texturing, and I’ve stuck to a very cartoony, animation focused style so far. I’ve been looking to do more realistic stuff though, since learning Substance Painter on my placement, and taken a course in advanced 3D modeling. Let me know when suits you best to message, I’m sure you’re busy in the studio during the day!

attachments.title: 3D modeling | Chloe O'Connor Modeling
attachments.text: Chloe O'Connor Modeling is a portfolio site of Chloe O'Connor Barry, Irish 3D Artist specialising in 3D modeling in Maya for CG projects such as animation and games

text:
Hi Chloe , just left the office ! 
I can definitely help you with with realism , I haven’t got a proper look at your work , I will this weekend.
Best time to contact me is at anytime , but I will be mostly a bit more free after 9pm .
